title: "SQL Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file())
library(DBI)
library(dplyr)
con <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), dbname = "flights.sqlite")
```

```{sql connection=con}
SELECT carrier, day, avg(arr_delay) as arr_delay, avg(dep_delay) as dep_delay
FROM flights
WHERE carrier in ('AA', 'UA') and month = 12
GROUP BY carrier, day
```

```{r}
tbl(con, "flights") %>%
  filter(carrier %in% c('AA', 'UA'), month == 12) %>%
  group_by(carrier, day) %>%
  summarize(arr_delay = mean(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE), dep_delay = mean(dep_delay, na.rm = TRUE))
```

```{r}
dbDisconnect(con)
```
